metadata.title: CVE-2021-28300 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in the "isomedia/track.c" module's "MergeTrack()" function of GPAC v0.5.2 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial-of-Service (DoS) by uploading a malicious MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
